title: lokai’s Bracelets Are Now Cruelty-Free After PETA Appeal (PETA - People for the Ethical Treatment ...
text: ( Source : PETA - People for the Ethical Treatment of Animals ) Animals Will No Longer Be Used to Retrieve Water From Mount Everest for Jeweler's Iconic Bracelets For Immediate Release : October 19 , 2015 Contact : Sophia Charchuk 202-483-7382
